body_html: @alicetragedy in general, I like lay-outs with square boxes. I thought it would be nice to have more of a "flat layout" throughout the site. Also, I think it looks nice on the activity stream and for consistency I thought I'd change it on all pages. Wdyt? If you are ok with that, click the green button :)

Also, I think it looks nice on the activity stream and for consistency I thought I'd change it on all pages. Wdyt? If you are ok with that, click the green button :)
